title: Interactive Demo
description: Experience Vaultic Crypto Engine's capabilities directly in your browser. All cryptographic operations happen locally - no data leaves your device.

keyGeneration.title: Key Generation
keyGeneration.description: Generate a secure RSA 2048-bit key pair with enhanced protection.
keyGeneration.security: Keys include protection against timing attacks
keyGeneration.publicKeyTooltip: Anyone can use this key to encrypt messages that only you can decrypt
keyGeneration.privateKeyTooltip: Keep this key secret! It's used to decrypt messages
keyGeneration.privateKeyInfo: Keep this key secure - never share your private key

encryption.title: Encryption
encryption.description: Encrypt a message with the public key. Hybrid RSA+AES encryption is automatically used for larger messages.
encryption.hybrid: Hybrid encryption (RSA+AES) was automatically used for this message size
encryption.usingHybrid: Using Vaultic's hybrid RSA+AES encryption for large data

decryption.title: Decryption
decryption.description: Decrypt a message with the private key. The method is automatically detected.
decryption.matchMessage: The decrypted message matches the original. The encryption/decryption cycle is complete and verified.
decryption.mismatchMessage: The decrypted message differs from the original input.

protection.title: Key Protection
protection.description: Protect your key pair with a password.

security.title: Secure Encryption
security.description: Encrypts with RSA or hybrid RSA+AES for large messages

systemLogs.generatingKeyPair: Generating RSA 2048-bit key pair with secure entropy...
systemLogs.publicKeyGenerated: Vaultic RSA public key generated ({{length}} chars)
systemLogs.privateKeyGenerated: Vaultic RSA private key generated ({{length}} chars)
systemLogs.keyPairProtection: Key pairs include Vaultic's additional Marvin attack protections
systemLogs.keyPairSuccess: ✅ Vaultic RSA key pair successfully generated!
systemLogs.noMessageError: ⚠️ Please enter a message to encrypt
systemLogs.noKeyPairError: ⚠️ Please generate a Vaultic RSA key pair first
systemLogs.hybridNotice: Large data automatically handled with hybrid RSA+AES encryption
systemLogs.privateKeyOnly: The message can now only be decrypted with the matching private key
systemLogs.wrongKeyError: This could be due to data corruption or using the wrong private key
systemLogs.noKeyToProtect: ⚠️ No key pair available to protect
systemLogs.noMessageToProtect: ⚠️ Please enter a message to protect
systemLogs.demoReset: Vaultic demo reset. Ready for new encryption session.
